name: Buffet Manager
description:
Objective

Keep your buffet in business for as long as possible.

Controls
  • Use your mouse to control the bottom panel.
  • Press Space to pause.
  • Press R to restart.
Instructions

Your buffet's environment decides the customers' happiness. The three environmental parameters are food, smell, and volume. Some customers value one parameter more than the others—this will be displayed as icons on top of them.

The ideal environment is as follows: Food - 100%, Smell - 0%, Volume - 50%.

However, you do not always want to be ideal. If a customer is too happy, they stay too long and eat too much; if a customer is too unhappy, there will be less customers in the future.

Wisely manage your customer's happiness and your buffet might survive this economy.
